Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} won't even tell *me* who paid for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PamName}}'s new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h
Entries.Mon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Maru: It's hard to do good science without {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}'s help...#$b#But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h
Entries.Fri4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}} has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u
Entries.summer_Mon: #$e#%{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} is deep in thought.#$e#Sorry, I'm really busy.#$e#There's so many plants to study right now.
Entries.summer_Fri: $p 40#So I heard {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.fall_Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}} sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.#$e#I'm glad she's so dedicated.
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I'm still flabbergasted about {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}'s secret robot... was it all a dream?
Entries.summer_25.001: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.
Entries.Introduction: Greetings! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}, local scientist and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Father:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusGender}}}}. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my daughter {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}? She's interested to meet you.

Entries.summer_25.001: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.

BeforeMovie.Text: A short jaunt in the snow really gets the blood flowing.

DuringMovie.Text: Longings of the heart...? Oh! You mean 'elevated levels of oxytocin in the limbic system'.

AfterMovie.Text: The art of film has come a long way since those times, hasn't it?

BeforeMovie.Text: This one's right up my alley... you know I'm gonna love this.$h

AfterMovie.Text: Well, they definitely embellished some things, but it was still mostly correct! Anyway, I had a good time.
